ing.item: Cut Into Three Layers, Lengthwise Ripe Bananas; ,Peeled And Sliced
Tbl Sliced Almonds; Or Chopped Nuts

directions.step:
In medium bowl beat cream and liqueur until soft peaks form. Place bottom layer of pound cake on serving platter. Spread 1/3 of cream mixture on layer; top with half the banana slices. Repeat with remaining layers, ending with whipped cream. Sprinkle with almonds. Posted to MC-Recipe Digest V1 #203
